QToolTip.disc: The file on disc to replace. This can be rooted as a full disc path or just a filename to search for.
QToolTip.external: The file on SD/USB to replace the disc file with.
QToolTip.resize: Defaults to true, specifies whether to resize the disc file to the external file.
QToolTip.create: Defaults to false, specifies whether to add the file on the disc if it does not exist.
QToolTip.offset: The offset into the disc file to start replacing; defaults to 0 (beginning of the file).
QToolTip.length: The length specifies how much to patch the file. If not specified, or set to 0, it will default to the size of the external file.
